PR1501G/S - PR1507G/S
1.5A FAST RECOVERY GLASS PASSIVATED RECTIFIER
Features ABA
· Glass Passivated Die Construction C · Diffused Junction D · Fast Switching for High Efficiency · High Current Capability and Low Forward DO-41 DO-15
Voltage Drop Dim Min Max Min Max · Surge Overload Rating to 50A Peak · Low Reverse Leakage Current A 25.40 ¾ 25.40 ¾ · Plastic Material: UL Flammability B 4.06 5.21 5.50 7.62 Classification Rating 94V-0 C 0.71 0.864 0.686 0.889 Mechanical Data D 2.00 2.72 2.60 3.60 · Case: Molded Plastic · Terminals: Plated Leads Solderable per All Dimensions in mm
MIL-STD-202, Method 208 “GS” Suffix Designates DO-41 Package · Polarity: Cathode Band “G” Suffix Designates DO-15 Package · Marking: Type Number · DO-41 Weight: 0.35 grams (approx.) · DO-15 Weight: 0.40 grams (approx.)
Maximum Ratings and Electrical Characteristics @ TA = 25°C unless otherwise specified
Single phase, half wave, 60Hz, resistive or inductive load. For capacitive load, derate current by 20%.
